io.sarl.lang.core

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.core.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable

    public class Agent
extends Object
implements Identifiable
    The definition of the notion of Agent in SARL. An agent is an autonomous entity having some intrinsic skills to realize the capacities it exhibits. An agent defines a context.
    Version:
    0.5.0-SNAPSHOT 2016-09-24 11:27:51
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.lang
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.lang.core

    • Constructor Detail

      • Agent

        public Agent(BuiltinCapacitiesProvider provider,
             UUID parentID,
             UUID agentID)
        Creates a new agent by parent parentID.
        Parameters:
        provider - - the provider of built-in capacities for this agent.
        parentID - - the agent's spawner.
        agentID - - the identifier of the agent, or null for computing it randomly.

      • setSkill

        @SafeVarargs
protected final <S extends Skill> S setSkill(S skill,
                                                          Class<? extends Capacity>... capacities)
        Set the skill for the Capacity capacity.

        If no capacity is provided as argument, this function will associate the skill to all the capacities it is implementing.

        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the skill.
        Parameters:
        capacities - the capacity or the capacities to set.
        skill - implementaion of capacity.
        Returns:
        the skill that was set.
        Since:
        0.4

      • $setSkill

        protected <S extends Skill> S $setSkill(S skill,
                                        Class<? extends Capacity>... iCapacities)
        Set the skill for the Capacity capacity.

        If no capacity is provided as argument, this function will associate the skill to all the capacities it is implementing.

        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the skill.
        Parameters:
        iCapacities - the capacity or the capacities to set.
        skill - implementaion of capacity.
        Returns:
        the skill that was set.
        Since:

      • clearSkill

        protected <S extends Capacity> S clearSkill(Class<S> capacity)
        Clears the Skill associated with the capacity.
        Type Parameters:
        S - - the type of the capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - - the capacity for which the skill must be cleared.
        Returns:
        the skill that was removed

      • getSkill

        @Pure
protected <S extends Capacity> S getSkill(Class<S> capacity)
        Replies with the skill associated to the Capacity capacity.

        The return may never be null. If not capacity was set, the exception UnimplementedCapacityException is thrown.

        Type Parameters:
        S - - the type of the capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - - the capacity to retreive.
        Returns:
        the skill, never null
        Throws:
        UnimplementedCapacityException - - if no skill is owned by the agent for the given capacity.

      • hasSkill

        @Pure
protected boolean hasSkill(Class<? extends Capacity> capacity)
        Checks if this agent has a Skill that implements the Capacity capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - - capacity to check
        Returns:
        true if it has a skill associate to this capacity, false otherwise

      • isMe

        @Pure
protected boolean isMe(Address address)
        Replies if the given address is one of the addresses of this agent. The test is done on the identifier replied by Address.getUUID().
        Parameters:
        address - - the address to test.
        Returns:
        true if the given address is one of this agent, otherwise false.

      • isMe

        @Pure
protected boolean isMe(UUID uID)
        Replies if the given identifier corresponds to the identifier of this agent.

        This function is equivalent to:

        
 id.equals( agent.getID() )
        Parameters:
        uID - - the identifier to test.
        Returns:
        true if the given identifier is the one of this agent, otherwise false.

      • isFromMe

        @Pure
protected boolean isFromMe(Event event)
        Replies if the given event was emitted by this agent.
        Parameters:
        event - - the event to test.
        Returns:
        true if the given event was emitted by this agent; otherwise false.
